thread.title: BRIEF-Long Blockchain Agrees To Acquire Hashcove, A UK-Based Company

title: BRIEF-Long Blockchain Agrees To Acquire Hashcove, A UK-Based Company
text: March 15, 2018 / 1:46 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Long Blockchain Agrees To Acquire Hashcove, A UK-Based Company Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Long Blockchain Corp: * LONG BLOCKCHAIN CORP. AGREES TO ACQUIRE HASHCOVE, A UK-BASED COMPANY BUILDING DISTRIBUTED LEDGER TECHNOLOGIES FOR FINANCIAL MARKETS * LONG BLOCKCHAIN CORP - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, LONG BLOCKCHAIN WILL ACQUIRE 100% OF HASHCOVE IN EXCHANGE FOR LBCC COMMON STOCK * LONG BLOCKCHAIN CORP - ‍UPON CLOSING, HASHCOVE WILL BECOME A WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY OF CO * LONG BLOCKCHAIN CORP - CURRENT SHAREHOLDERS OF HASHCOVE WILL OWN 4.9% OF COMBINED ENTITY, AT CLOSING OF DEAL * LONG BLOCKCHAIN - ‍CURRENT SHAREHOLDERS OF HASHCOVE CAN INCREASE THEIR OWNERSHIP TO 17.1% OF COMBINED ENTITY BASED ON CERTAIN MILESTONES​ * LONG BLOCKCHAIN CORP - ‍ HASHCOVE CEO KUNAL NANDWANI WILL BECOME AN EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND DIRECTOR OF CO FOLLOWING CLOSE OF TRANSACTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
